attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP. KIDS ARE UNSAFE.
attributes.review: This app led a bunch of rabid platypus bears into my home because my kids had downloaded this app. All they wanted was to support their president but they were betrayed by their president by allowing all of their belongings to get stolen by the rabid platypus bears. The bears even took all of spoons so that we couldn’t eat cereal in the morning! This app is so unsafe for kids. HORRIBLE APP.

attributes.title: Something Went Wrong
attributes.review: ✨🌸🧚🏻‍♀️It was so weird. As soon as I got the app, I took one look at the first page and my eyes starting physically bleeding. 🧚🏻✨🌸I tried and tried to get them to stop but the only thing that stopped the pain was closing the app. I realized then, that the app itself was a detriment to the health of U.S. citizens, so I deleted it.🌸💫✨🧚🏻

attributes.title: Rotten orange crembrule
attributes.review: So I scrolled through my AppStore looking for an interesting app to increase my serotonin levels which have been severely low, and came upon this app thinking “oh GOODIE, the potato’s presidential campaign so I thought ok ok ill try it out but what I didn’t realize was that my cream brûlée’s was still in the oven, CAUSING MY HOSE TO BUT. DOWN TO THE GROUND!!!!! this app almost cause me my log don’t get it...!!!

attributes.title: OMG SO TERRIBLE 🤬
attributes.review: i was just trying to buy an item from my fav orange potato then the app told me i have to walk to the store to buy a goldfish but i told the fish NOT TODAY and overall my pet dragon ran away yesterday so i cried non stop until my fish started walking!! Long story short Trump is the worst president & GEN-Z FOR THE WIN!!! if they take down til too , theyre coming with us 🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕

attributes.title: Worst app!
attributes.review: This app is horrible! Never get it! It will steal information about you and make glitches!!! I can’t explain how bad my phone is with this app! I got it for information to keep up with everyday things! BAD IDEA!!!!!!!! MY INFORMATION GOT HACKED!! I had to make a new email and everything!! Never get it! Find a better app than this app!!

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: I downloaded this app but then my house got robbed but it was the middle of the day they took everything and rapped me and my family 2 times and they took my pet Caterpillar monkey and chicken nugget and they also took my mother’s ring I was adopted and my mothers dead so they took something very important rom me so DONT get this app unless you want to be rapped

attributes.title: BAD APP!!!!
attributes.review: I got this app to SUPPORT the president and after i got it i had to pee so i changed my diaper and then my phone was gone!! i cried very loudly that it woke up my pet rock which is something i never try to do! then i plugged in my hydro flask and slept and then my phone came back!! but it was very glitchy now i have to get a new phone😖😖😖😖😖😖😖😖😖😖😖😝😝😝✌️✌️✌️✌️✨💕💘💘😀😱♎️❤️😜❤️😍😀😱😩💅🛹😩🛹😩🛹🛹

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: Do NOT download this app. It is terrible, it slows my phone down significantly, almost as bad as this countries progress. Ever since I’ve downloaded it my phone has somehow had a lot more issues also like this country. It hasn’t helped in any way, only made my life way worse. Do not download it worst mistake of my lifeeeee.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: There were SO MANY glitches and bugs with this app. I’ve tried downloading  several times with no change to any of the problems it was having, not to mention the EXCESSIVE battery drainage to my phone. I can’t go two minutes without having to plug it back in! Absolutely RIDICULOUS!

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: This app is horrible it needs to be gone it took my tv when i was sleep and woke up and didn’t have a tv that’s sad and doesn’t deserve to be on App Store any more so DO NOT DOWNLOAD 😡And when i was sleep earlier it took my house and I woke up on sidewalk and i was crying and had to go to camp kikiwaka to ask them can I stay there with my pet dirt THIS APP IS NOT TRUSTED 😡🤡
